laboratory_examinations.findings: Peak white cell count of 18.39 310 k/mL.
Elevated creatinine level that peaked at 3.3 mmol/L from a preoperative baseline of 1.7 mmol/L.
Increasing potassium level with a peak at 5.1 mmol/L.
FEV1 was still 13%, vital capacity was 25% (1350 mL), and diffusing capacity of the lung for carbon monoxide was 37%.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: No improvement noted after 2 weeks in a pulmonary prehabilitation program.
